headline: The 12 Worst Stocks of 2025—and the 1 That Could Turn Around
summary: The market has had a good year, but the 12 worst stocks in the S&P 500 were down an average of 50% headed into Monday’s trading.

headline: These 2 were the busiest U.S. apparel and beauty stores on Black Friday
summary: Investing.com -- In a note to clients on Monday, Piper Sandler highlighted the strongest in-store traffic among U.S. apparel and beauty retailers over Black Friday weekend.

headline: Could Retail Stocks Rally Into Year End? What the Charts of Marriott, On Holding, Lululemon Say.
summary: With recession chatter still buzzing, the consumer discretionary sector has taken its share of hits.  The ETF is up 6% year to date, edging out just real estate and consumer staples.  The XRT has gained 5% over the past month compared with only a 1% gain for the consumer discretionary ETF.
